pages.text: $(li)The Golden Horse Armor is the upgrade of the Iron Horse Armor that you can give to your tamed Horse.$(br)$(li)You can craft this armor with a Iron Horse Armor and Gold Ingots in a Crafting Table.
$(li)While you have the Golden Horse Armor on your hand, just right click on your tamed Horse, then place the Golden Horse Armor in the Armor slot.$(br2)Insert a picture equipping an armor
